p: We also modeled the annual tree height increment (ATHI) response (by three-step model selection, Appendix S2, as for tree height) against annual dryness index, which was identified as the best variable to represent climatic transfer distance and temperature difference (TD = MTWM âˆ’ MTCM = continentality), which was selected as the best variable to represent seed source climate. The results displayed in the supplementary information ( Fig. S2; Table S6) reveal a trend similar to that for tree height ( Fig. 3), confirming the general pattern of flatter response curves for Q. petraea and F. sylvatica and more pronounced, narrow curves for the two conifer species ( Fig. S2).
